summary: Ovidiu, a high-school teacher looking for an extra buck, finds an unexpected way to earn easy money.
cast: Mircea Diaconu|Gheorghe Dinica|Mara Nicolescu|Viorica Voda|Marius Florea Vizante|Florin Zamfirescu|Cristian Gheorghe|Florin Calinescu|Constantin Draganescu|Monica Ghiuta|Ovidiu Niculescu|Valentin Popescu|Nae Caranfil|Gabriela Bobes|Marius Capota|George Lungoci|Marius Rizea|Anamaria Marinca
title: Filantropica
